function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Increase national reserves of critical medical supplies and optimize production workflows for medical equipment","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase national reserves of critical medical supplies and improve preparation for future pandemics","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement a shift in the approach to funding scientific research during pandemics to promote low-cost, scalable solutions","category":"Staff training / materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Expand search to include additional databases and sources, and conduct a more comprehensive literature review","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduce contact time between health care workers and patients","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement medical robotics for testing","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of cost-effective and rapidly deployable robotic solutions for pandemic response, focusing on accessibility and scalability.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing national reserves of opioid medications, implementing pooled purchasing platforms, and providing basic palliative care training to primary caregivers and health care professionals.","category":"Absorb surge in service improving automation, and stockpiling of medical equipment","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in cost-effective 3d printing and transport protocols, and provide clear instructions for sample collection.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provide comprehensive and easily
